title: MJ

description.plain: MJ by future is the 9th track from mixtape pluto. This song is dedicated to threesomes (FFM) that Futures' partner hosts for him. The phrase “my bitch got more bitches than me” been repeated in the outro 25 times in total. This line indicates how his partner finds other women to take part in Futures' three ways. By the looks of it, it seems like only his main partner is the repeated character in the devils tango, his partner keeps introducing new women to spice things up. Quite freaky of Future to dedicate an entire song about threesomes.

embed_content: Read “MJ” by Future on Genius
